channel.title: Staying Persistent on Windows on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Staying Persistent on Windows on Analyst

item.title: Autostart
item.description: There are several ways to stay persistant on a Windows machine. One of them is to set up the program to be automatically started at certain time (most often - at system startup).

item.title: Windows Management Instrumentation
item.description: Terms cmdlet - put certain enhanced operating system functions into effect when usung powershell, example: Get-Help.
